name: MidcoSmartHOME
0:
”Alexa, turn on porch light”
”Alexa, set thermostat to 74 degrees”
”Alexa, brighten corner lamp to 80 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: With Midco SmartHOME and Alexa, you can now interact with certain Midco SmartHOME devices, such Midco Smart Thermostat and Midco Smart Lightbulbs, by voice. To get started, go to the Alexa app and select Enable to link your Amazon smart home account and discover your Midco devices. Find more information about connecting devices to Alexa at http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home.
